text: Giovanni Palmieri dos Santos (born 23 June 1989), simply known as Giovanni, is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays for Cruzeiro, mainly as a left back. His younger brother, Emerson, is also a footballer. == Honours == ;Fluminense * Primeira Liga: 2016 ;América Mineiro * Campeonato Brasileiro Série B: 2017 == References == == External links == * * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian people of Italian descent Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série A players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série B players Category:Esporte Clube Noroeste players Category:Botafogo Futebol Clube (SP) players Category:Guaratinguetá Futebol players Category:Clube Atlético Penapolense players Category:Criciúma Esporte Clube players Category:Fluminense FC players Category:Clube Náutico Capibaribe players Category:América Futebol Clube (MG) players Category:Associação Atlética Ponte Preta players Category:Esporte Clube Bahia players
title: Giovanni Palmieri dos Santos
